text: “Sikulakwa kwa inu kufunafuna zabwino kwa Mbuye wanu (pogulitsa zinthu zanu uku muli m’mapemphero a Hajj, kapena kugula). Ndipo mukabwerera kuchokera ku Arafat, tamandani Allah pamalo otchedwa Masha’r Harâm (Muzdalifa). Ndipo mkumbukireni monga momwe adakutsogolerani, chikhalirecho kale mudali mwa osokera
